title: Better Smelting
body:
Now this spirit is ordering me to create a Smeltery. Ordering. Its now demanding. I don't have to do any of this, but.. it does help me quite a bit with the rewards. I'd say its partially worth it.
    He does give me hints about what's happened though. None of which are really useful yet, but they might get somewhere. I have trust in it, it was probably a person just like me at once. I wonder why it was cursed. I wonder..
    Wait a second! Why did those pirates hold me hostage in the first place! Were they trying to curse me?! Are they actually wizards!?!
    I swear im going crazy...
